title: Bear Haven
description: Bear Haven is a horror game where you need to survive the night from the scary bear. You are a new part-time electrician in Bear Haven Motel who get a night shift job. There's a lack of guests at this time and also there are some strange problems with the electrical system at night, make sure you'll manage to fix them all before 6 AM or you'll be fired. But beware of the bear! Hide and turn off the light if you see one of them. Don't let the bear get you!
